fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Two exhibitions have been listed in South editions of the Guide as being at Suffolk’s Snape Maltings Concert Hall: Helen Riches (22 June, page 22) and Contemporary Landing (29 June, page 22). They are at a different venue in the art complex, the Maltings Gallery. • After this week’s Weekend magazine had been printed, we realised the Let’s move to … column, which is about central Brighton in East Sussex, was illustrated with a picture of Brunswick Square, which is in neighbouring Hove (29 June, page 73). • Other recently corrected articles include: UK population rises to 66.4 million but rate of growth slows Ukrainian tycoon can be extradited to US, Austrian court rules Mark Field urged to quit as minister after grabbing climate protester Tories choose Ken Doll as Mr Blobby’s hustings warm-up act Girish Karnad obituary
